inlineContent.text: Create a video player experience optimized for tvOS
to build an app suitable for the living room environment.
UI optimized for the living room environment.
Set up basic AVPlayerViewController on tvOS.
You can start with the same code as iOS.
Provide additional metadata to the Info panel
Set basic info with AVPlayerItem’s externalMetadata.
Support quick seeking with touch surface swipes.
Handle remote button events with pressesHandler.
but you can add custom behavior.
Display content in home screen Top Shelf
Handle deep links to start playback immediately
when content is selected from Top Shelf.
continuous playback (Up Next) and Top Shelf.
How do you display metadata in the Info panel on tvOS?
Adding metadata items to the externalMetadata array
makes the system automatically display them in the Info panel.
dynamic media metadata is set in code.
Developer must add gesture recognizer manually
It’s automatically supported in the default player.
Swipe seeking is a core feature of tvOS player.
What is the default behavior of Siri Remote swipe seeking on tvOS?

metadata.title: tvOS Optimization
metadata.category: Building a Video Player with AVKit

abstract.text: Implement multilingual subtitle and audio track selection
to support global users.
Support PiP mode so videos can be watched
during multitasking.
Implement continuous playback and playlist features
using AVQueuePlayer.
Stream video to Apple TV or AirPlay-compatible devices
via AirPlay.
Implement multilingual subtitle and audio track selection
to support global users.
Understand the core concepts of the AVKit framework
and its relationship with AVFoundation.
Implement precise seeking and chapter navigation
so users can easily jump to desired positions.
